description:
#### Package Parameters
The following package parameters can be set:

 * `/analysis` - Install tools for SQL Server Analysis Services.
 * `/integration` - Install tools for SQL Server Integration Services.
 * `/reporting` - Install tools for SQL Server Reporting Services.
 
To pass parameters, use --params "''" (e.g. choco install ssdt15 [other options] --params="'/analysis /reporting'").

When no parameters are provided then ONLY the Visual Studio Integrated Shell will be installed.
displayName: Microsoft SQL Server Data Tools for Visual Studio 2015
summary: This update addresses product defects for SQL Server projects, database deployments, and database tools.
author: Microsoft Corporation
